Name: Model of a Farmyard
Description: A model of a farmyard is rare. Usually, a farmyard was only depicted as a wall relief among scenes of daily life. This model farmyard has a high pigeon tower on one side and cattle lying down on the other. Two men are seated among the cattle. A man wearing a wig is feeding a cow that has patches of colored hair on its hide. Pigeons are perched in the window of the tower.
